page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The policeman for{Kingsley}is {Constable Roberts }and for{Manley}any policeman from Frodsham area. The worst crime commited in the area shown is burglary .In this area {ninetynine {percent}of the criminals are captured.(this is according to {Constable Roberts.)}The punishment the criminal would get would be helping people, community service or prison. The most common crime is{damage.}The {policemans}car has a radio which links to the{police station,}some{police {houses}and always to other{policecars. Around the area police are not needed for traffic patrol with it being a fairly quiet area, they are only needed for things like Carnivals which need the road. The nearest{Police {station}to us is Frodsham but we do have a{Police house}but that is in the village of{Crowton}two miles away.
